location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Mount Aboo [Ä€bu] to Sir Charles Hall, the Chief Clerk to the Vice Chancellor

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Pelly's purchase of the property Cuckoo Hall Farm, Edmonton and a potential delay in payment for the property being received by the Court of Chancery owing to the death of Narayn Vasedes and Pelly's finances being tied up in the deceased's estate until the will is proven.
